TECHNICAL.description: Any conversation which is specifically technical in nature, including IT related questions, software related questions, requests that require the writing of new code or the modification of existing code.

FACTUAL.description: Requests that require encyclopedic or objectively factual information or data

REASONING.description: Requests that require complex reasoning or logic skills, or riddles and brain teasers

MATH.description: Requests involving math, including requests to solve or validate mathematical formulas
